Package Management.GeneralManagement

Class Airship

java.lang.Object
Management.GeneralManagement.Airship
public class Airship extends Object
This class is used to create airships and to manage their properties, notably their quarters.

  • Field Details

    • name

      private final String name
      Name of the airship.

    • quarterList

      private final Quarter[][] quarterList
      Matrix of the quarters build in the airship. Compared to the buildable quarters displayed, it has 2 more rows on the top and bottom, and 2 more columns on the left and right, so that the adjacentQuarter function works.

  • Constructor Details

    • Airship

      public Airship​(String name)
      Creates a new instance of airship.
      The method loads the value of the different properties from the AirshipData.csv and initializes the pane containing the button for each quarter place. These buttons are placed depending on the list of available positions inside the CSV file.
      - If the button of a non-null quarter is selected, its information are displayed.
      - If the button of a null quarter is selected and the property selectedBuildQuarter of GlobalManager is not empty, the quarter described in selectedBuildQuarter is build at the spot of the selected quarter.
      - If the property selectedBuildQuarter of GlobalManager is not empty but the construction can not happen, the selected quarter button blink in red.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the airship

  • Method Details

    • getSelectedQuarter

      public int[] getSelectedQuarter()
      Returns the position of the selected quarter.

    • getImage

      public AnimatedThing getImage()
      Returns the image property.

    • getToggleQuarter

      public static javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup getToggleQuarter()
      Returns the TogglfeGroup of the button of each quarter.

    • getQuarterPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane getQuarterPane()
      Returns the pane containing the button of each quarter.

    • getQuarterInfoPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getQuarterInfoPane()
      Returns the pane containing the quarter information.

    • constructQuarter

      public int constructQuarter​(String quarterName, int xPos, int yPos, boolean resourcesException)
      Builds the selected quarter at the specified position.
      Beforehand, the method check if the player disposes of enough resources to build the quarter and if the selected position is empty. The boolean resourcesException allow to build the quarter without using resource.
      No matter the outcome, the build button is unselected in the end.
      Parameters:
      quarterName - the name of the quarter the player wants to build
      xPos - the x desired position of the quarter
      yPos - the y desired position of the quarter
      resourcesException - allows building without using resources
      Returns:
      0 in case of successful building, -1 otherwise

    • upgrade

      public void upgrade​(Quarter quarter)
      Upgrades the selected quarter.
      The method first check if the quarter can be upgraded, then if the player disposes of enough resources to upgrade it.
      No matter the outcome, the upgrade button is unselected in the end.
      Parameters:
      quarter - the quarter to upgrade

    • getAdjacent

      public Quarter[] getAdjacent​(Quarter quarter)
      Returns the list of every quarter adjacent to the considered quarter.
      If there is no quarter at one of the adjacent position, the corresponding cell in the list is null.
      Parameters:
      quarter - the considered quarter
      Returns:
      the list of the 4 adjacent quarters

    • calculateFoodBonus

      public void calculateFoodBonus()
      Computes the bonuses from the amount of available food in the ship. (implemented but not integrated yet)
      If the amount of food is low, the player face hard penalties on ths ship, while if it disposes of a great amount, he got some bonuses.
      The presence of a quarter Galley also increase the bonuses, as well as if the production is equilibrated between TemporalCaboose quarters and Birdcatcher quarters.

    • manageElectricityOverconsumption

      public void manageElectricityOverconsumption()
      Manages the over consumption of electricity by disabling random quarters. (implemented but not integrated yet)
      If at the end of a turn after having subtract the consumption of electricity of each quarter, the amount of remaining electricity is below 0, quarters are randomly disabled. Each time a quarter is disabled, its electricity consumption is added to the amount of electricity of the ship. While the amount of electricity is below, the method continues to disabled more quarters. Quarters that produces electricity can not be disabled.

    • updateProduction

      public void updateProduction()
      Computes the production for each quarter on the ship.
      In order to handle well the computation, the production is calculated in the order of the quarters inside the priority list.
